titles.title: Thin Blue Line Act
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide additional aggravating factors for the imposition of the death penalty based on the status of the victim.

bill.summary:
2/9/2015--Introduced. Thin Blue Line Act
Amends the federal criminal code to make the killing or attempted killing of a law enforcement officer, firefighter, or other first responder an aggravating factor in death penalty determinations.
